ej,gereb001,M,muchm901,Obstruction call on Mark Ellis $Mark Ellis and Joey Gathright made contact when Ellis tried to field the ground ball; Ellis wanted interference but was called for obstructing Gathright; Oakland Manager Bob Geren ejected by 2B umpire Mike Muchlinski, who had made the call; rule 10.12(c) requires an error be charged on the play but that ruling was changed later in the game to a single, probably due to Ellis' 81-game errorless streak
